attributes.action: ensure that 50 percent of all new housing within an area is within the local populations price range.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In many areas of the UK, low wages are paid but the price of new housing is so high that local people cannot afford to stay in the local area. If 50 percent of new housing was built to be within reach of the average local wage, this would reduce the problem.
